Description: 2017 Pelham Blue Epiphone Les Paul Standard Electric Guitar. Epiphone Les Paul Standard - Built to Gibson SpecsThe Epiphone Les Paul Standard is the perfect choice. A mahogany back and maple top will give you the classic Les Paul tone you're after. Dual humbucking pickups are ready for any gig situation from ballads to full-on metal. You'll find the mahogany neck and pau ferro fretboard extremely comfortable and toneful. Careful construction and attention to detail make this Les Paul Standard a true workhorse. Grab an Epiphone Les Paul Standard and start down your road to fame today!Select woods for killer toneThe Epiphone Les Paul Standard's body woods present a combination of clarity, definition and treble bite from the maple, and excellent depth and richness from the mahogany. The set-in mahogany neck and pau ferro fretboard further enhance this guitar's tone. You'll love the full-range sound, tonality, and playability of the Epiphone Les Paul Standard.Pickups for any occasionLes Pauls have always been a very flexible guitar. The alnico humbuckers in the Epiphone Les Paul Standard give you everything from spitfire rock tones to warm jazz tones. These humbucking pickups have tons of output so you'll never get lost in the mix. No matter what style of music you play, the Epiphone Les Paul Standard is ready.A classic rock guitarFor generations, guitar players have gravitated toward the Les Paul. Rock icons such as Jimmy Page, Eric Clapton, Jeff Beck, Slash, and many others heavily utilized the Les Paul. From warm, fat blues tones to scorching rock riffs and solos, the Les Paul has done it all. Call your Sweetwater Sales Engineer today and pick up a classic — the Epiphone Les Paul Standard.Epiphone Les Paul Standard Solidbody Electric Guitar Features:Classic Les Paul guitar style in an affordable packageHot pickups for great rock soundsMahogany body and neck for sustain and toneReliable, well-built guitar that will last A beautiful guitar!There are repaired cracks on either side of the neck running about an 1 1/2" from the nut (see photos).
